name: Keep the station alive
description:
Keep the station alive

You have one mission:

Defend the Station

It's crucial to our allies that this station is fully recharge, so, do not let the enemies destroy it.

Fight against waves of 5 different enemies, that will try to destroy your ship.

Use rockets to explode multiple enemies at the same time.

Fight for your life, and, most important, for the health of the Station!

Controls

WASD: Move

Mouse 1: Fire

Mouse 2: Fire rockets

Source code available at https://github.com/arturnista/ld46_unity

Developed for Ludum Dare 46
Theme: Keep it alive
